1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import rospy
4 from threading import Lock, Thread
5 
6 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus, BasicObject, BasicObjectArray
7 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import GetNameDescriptionList, GetNameDescriptionListResponse
8 
9 from std_msgs.msg import Int32, Bool, Header
10 from trajectory_msgs.msg import JointTrajectory
11 from trajectory_msgs.msg import JointTrajectoryPoint
12 from end_effector_interface.msg import EEButtonStatus
13 
14 from .trajectory_file_manager import TrajectoryFileManager
15 from .command_enums import ArmCommanderException
16 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.srv import ManageTrajectory, ManageTrajectoryRequest, GetTrajectory
17 
18 from niryo_robot_poses_handlers.file_manager import NiryoRobotFileException
19 
20 EXECUTE_AFTER_LEARNED = False
21 
22 
23 class TrajectoryHandlerNode:
24 
25  def __init__(self, arm_state, trajectory_executor):
26  self.__arm_state = arm_state
27  self.__traj_executor = trajectory_executor
28 
29  self.__frequency = rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param("~trajectory_frequency"))
30  self.__lock = Lock()
31  self.__record_thread = Thread()
32  self.__recording = False
33 
34  # - Subscribers
35  self.__save_pos_button_topic = rospy.Subscriber(
36  '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/end_effector_interface/save_pos_button_status',
37  EEButtonStatus,
38  self.__callback_save_pos_button_status)
39 
40  # - Publisher
41  self.save_trajectory_publisher = rospy.Publisher("/niryo_robot/blockly/save_trajectory", Int32, queue_size=10)
42  self.__learning_trajectory_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~learning_trajectory', Bool, queue_size=10)
43  self.__trajectory_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~trajectory_list',
44  BasicObjectArray,
45  queue_size=10,
46  latch=True)
47 
48  # Services
49  self.traj_file_manager = TrajectoryFileManager(rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot_poses_handlers/trajectories_dir"))
50  rospy.Service('~manage_trajectory', ManageTrajectory, self.__callback_manage_trajectory)
51  rospy.Service('~get_trajectory', GetTrajectory, self.__callback_get_trajectory)
52  rospy.Service('~get_trajectory_list', GetNameDescriptionList, self.__callback_get_trajectory_list)
53 
54  rospy.on_shutdown(self.stop_record)
55 
56  self.__publish_trajectory_list()
57 
58  def save_trajectory(self, trajectory, trajectory_name="last_executed_trajectory", description="", auto=True):
59  if self.check_trajectory_existence(trajectory_name) and not auto:
60  return False
61  self.create_trajectory_file(str(trajectory_name), str(description), trajectory.points)
62  return True
63 
64  def update_trajectory(self, name="", description="", new_name=""):
65  status = True
66  if name:
67  if self.check_trajectory_existence(name):
68  if (not self.check_trajectory_existence(new_name) and name != new_name) or (name == new_name):
69  try:
70  trajectory = self.get_trajectory(name)
71  self.remove_trajectory_file(name)
72  self.create_trajectory_file(new_name, description, trajectory.points)
73  except Exception:
74  rospy.logwarn("TrajectoryHandlerNode::update_trajectory - Wrong trajectory format")
75  status = False
76  else:
77  status = False
78  else:
79  status = False
80  else:
81  status = False
82  return status
83 
84  def check_trajectory_existence(self, trajectory_name):
85  trajectory_name_list, _description_list = self.get_available_trajectories_w_description()
86  if str(trajectory_name) in trajectory_name_list:
87  return True
88  else:
89  return False
90 
91  def create_trajectory_file(self, name, description, points):
92  """
93  Create a pose from ManageTrajectory message fields
94 
95  :type name: str
96  :type description: str
97  :type points: list[JointTrajectoryPoint]
98  :return: None
99  """
100  self.traj_file_manager.create(str(name), points, str(description))
101  self.__publish_trajectory_list()
102 
103  def get_trajectory(self, name):
104  """
105  Get trajectory from trajectories manager and return a JointTrajectory
106 
107  :param name: pose name
108  :type name: str
109  :return: The trajectory object
110  :rtype: JointTrajectory
111  """
112  traj_read = self.traj_file_manager.read(str(name))
113  list_poses_raw = traj_read.list_poses
114  return JointTrajectory(header=Header(stamp=rospy.Time.now()),
115  joint_names=rospy.get_param("~joint_names"),
116  points=[JointTrajectoryPoint(positions=pose_raw) for pose_raw in list_poses_raw])
117 
118  def get_trajectory_first_point(self, name):
119  """
120  Get trajectory's from trajectories manager and return list of NiryoPose
121 
122  :param name: pose name
123  :type name: str
124  :return: The trajectory's first pose object
125  :rtype: Joints
126  """
127  try:
128  trajectory = self.get_trajectory(name)
129  return trajectory.points[0].positions
130  except Exception as e:
131  rospy.logwarn(f'TrajectoryHandlerNode::get_trajectory_first_point - {e}')
132 
133  def get_trajectory_file(self, name):
134  """
135  Get the trajectory file associated to the name given
136 
137  :param name: pose name
138  :type name: str
139  :return: The trajectory file
140  :rtype: dict
141  """
142  try:
143  return self.traj_file_manager.read(str(name))
144  except Exception as e:
145  rospy.logwarn(f'TrajectoryHandlerNode::get_trajectory_file - {e}')
146 
147  def remove_trajectory_file(self, name):
148  """
149  Asks trajectories manager to remove pose
150 
151  :param name: trajectory name
152  :type name: str
153  :return: None
154  """
155  self.traj_file_manager.remove(str(name))
156  self.__publish_trajectory_list()
157 
158  def get_available_trajectories_w_description(self):
159  """
160  Ask the trajectories' manager which trajectories are available
161 
162  :return: list of trajectories name
163  :rtype: list[str]
164  """
165  return self.traj_file_manager.get_all_names_w_description()
166 
167  def record(self):
168  if self.__lock.acquire(False):
169  try:
170  self.__recording = True
171  self.__learning_trajectory_publisher.publish(True)
172  self.__arm_state.force_learning_mode(True)
173 
174  trajectory = JointTrajectory(header=Header(), joint_names=rospy.get_param("~joint_names"), points=[])
175  time_ref = rospy.Time.now()
176  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and self.__recording:
177  trajectory.points.append(
178  JointTrajectoryPoint(time_from_start=rospy.Time.now() - time_ref,
179  positions=self.__arm_state.joint_states))
180  self.__frequency.sleep()
181  self.__recording = False
182  self.__learning_trajectory_publisher.publish(False)
183  self.__arm_state.force_learning_mode(False)
184  finally:
185  self.__lock.release()
186  else:
187  return
188 
189  if len(trajectory.points) > 1:
190  self.save_trajectory(trajectory)
191  self.blockly_save_trajectory()
192  try:
193  result = self.get_trajectory("last_executed_trajectory")
194  if EXECUTE_AFTER_LEARNED:
195  self.__traj_executor.execute_joint_trajectory(result)
196  except Exception:
197  rospy.logwarn("TrajectoryHandlerNode::record - Wrong trajectory format")
198  else:
199  print("Not enough points to create Trajectory")
200 
201  def stop_record(self):
202  self.__recording = False
203 
204  # - Callbacks
205 
206  def __callback_manage_trajectory(self, req):
207  cmd = req.cmd
208  if cmd == req.SAVE_LAST_LEARNED:
209  try:
210  if not self.check_trajectory_existence("last_executed_trajectory"):
211  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_RENAME_FAILURE, \
212  "No trajectory to save on hold"
213 
214  status = self.update_trajectory("last_executed_trajectory", req.description, req.name)
215  if status:
216  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created trajectory '{}'".format(req.name)
217  else:
218  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_RENAME_FAILURE, \
219  "A trajectory is already saved with this name"
220  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
221  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_RENAME_FAILURE, str(e)
222  elif cmd == req.SAVE:
223  try:
224  _status = self.save_trajectory(req.trajectory, req.name, req.description)
225  if _status:
226  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Saved trajectory '{}'".format(req.name)
227  else:
228  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_CREATION_FAILED, 'Name already taken'
229  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
230  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
231  elif cmd == req.DELETE:
232  try:
233  self.remove_trajectory_file(req.name)
234  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Removed trajectory '{}'".format(req.name)
235  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
236  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED, str(e)
237  elif cmd == req.DELETE_ALL:
238  try:
239  trajectory_name_list, description_list = self.get_available_trajectories_w_description()
240  for trajectory in trajectory_name_list:
241  self.remove_trajectory_file(trajectory)
242  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Removed All Trajectories "
243  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
244  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED, str(e)
245  elif cmd == req.UPDATE:
246  try:
247  status = self.update_trajectory(req.name, req.description, req.new_name)
248  if status:
249  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Updated Trajectory '{}'".format(req.name)
250  else:
251  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_RENAME_FAILURE, "Name already taken, Update Failed"
252  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
253  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_RENAME_FAILURE, str(e)
254  elif cmd == req.EXECUTE_REGISTERED:
255  try:
256  if self.check_trajectory_existence(req.name):
257  trajectory = self.get_trajectory(req.name)
258  return self.__traj_executor.execute_joint_trajectory(trajectory)
259  else:
260  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_EXECUTE_REGISTERED_FAILURE, str(NiryoRobotFileException)
261  except ArmCommanderException as e:
262  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_EXECUTE_REGISTERED_FAILURE, str(e)
263  elif cmd == req.EXECUTE:
264  try:
265  return self.__traj_executor.execute_joint_trajectory(req.trajectory)
266  except ArmCommanderException as e:
267  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_EXECUTE_FAILURE, str(e)
268  elif cmd == req.GO_TO_FIRST_POINT:
269  try:
270  trajectory = self.get_trajectory(req.name)
271  trajectory.points = [trajectory.points[0]]
272  return self.__traj_executor.execute_joint_trajectory(trajectory)
273  except ArmCommanderException as e:
274  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_EXECUTE_FAILURE, str(e)
275  else:
276  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "cmd '{}' not found.".format(req.cmd)
277 
278  def __callback_get_trajectory_list(self, _):
279  response = GetNameDescriptionListResponse()
280  response.status = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
281 
282  try:
283  response.name_list, response.description_list = self.get_available_trajectories_w_description()
284  except Exception as e:
285  rospy.logerr("Trajectory Handlers - Error occured when getting trajectories list: {}".format(e))
286  response.status = CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE
287  response.message = str(e)
288 
289  response.objects = [
290  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name,
291  description in zip(response.name_list, response.description_list)
292  ]
293  return response
294 
295  def __callback_get_trajectory(self, req):
296  try:
297  trajectory = self.get_trajectory(req.name)
298  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", trajectory
299  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
300  return CommandStatus.TRAJECTORY_HANDLER_GET_TRAJECTORY_FAILURE, str(e), JointTrajectory()
301 
302  def __callback_save_pos_button_status(self, msg):
303  if msg.action == EEButtonStatus.NO_ACTION:
304  self.stop_record()
305 
306  elif msg.action == EEButtonStatus.LONG_PUSH_ACTION and not self.__recording:
307  if not self.__record_thread.is_alive():
308  self.__record_thread = Thread(target=self.record)
309  self.__record_thread.start()
310 
311  def __publish_trajectory_list(self):
312  trajectory_array = BasicObjectArray()
313  trajectory_array.objects = [
314  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name,
315  description in zip(*self.get_available_trajectories_w_description())
316  ]
317  self.__trajectory_list_publisher.publish(trajectory_array)
318 
319  def blockly_save_trajectory(self):
320  self.save_trajectory_publisher.publish(Int32(data=1))
